text: You have to be unique and different and shine in your own way.
author: Lady Gaga

text: In a world full of trends, I want to remain a classic.
author: Iman

text: If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun.
author: Katharine Hepburn

text: You can't cry pretty. I tried.
author: Carrie Underwood

text: I'm not bossy, I'm the boss.
author: Beyoncé

text: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
author: Estee Lauder

text: I'm tough, ambitious, and I know exactly what I want.
author: Madonna

text: My life is a romantic comedy minus the romance and just me laughing at my own jokes.
author: Mindy Kaling

text: You can’t be bitter and expect your life to be sweet.
author: Megan Thee Stallion

text: Some women fear the fire. Some simply become it.
author: R.H. Sin

text: I’m doing better than I ever was. It’s me, hi, I’m the problem, it’s me.
author: Taylor Swift

text: Strong women don’t have attitudes — they have standards.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: I’m not a snack; I’m the whole meal.
author: Lizzo
